title: so what does gd think of jhin?
body:
ive been playing him quite a bit and i gotta say i quite like him.  his laning is really good, and he snowballs pretty hard.  problem is he is weak to all in comps unless he has godlike peel, and is really weak if behind.

so what do you guys think?  op, up, balanced?  i think he is farely balanced but could use a bit of qol changes.  make his ult zoom out faster for instance.
